message:
Strong Condemnation and Protest against Shibir Activist murder by Chhatra League and Jubo League goons:

Bangladesh Islami Chhatrashibir severely slammed and protested against brutal murder of a Shibir activist by Chhatra League and Jubo League terrorists at Chouddogram in Comilla.

In a protest statement, the Secretary-General of Bangladesh Islami Chhatrashibir Abdul Jabbar said, “Alkora Union Chhatra League top goons named Salauddin, Alam, Delwar, Mamun, Rana, Rinku and Saiful abducted and barbarically tortured Shibir Activist Abdul Aziz when he was out of the mosque after Magrib Salah. This operation was as directed by the Union Chairman Bachchu and took place in Kulashohor area. Having been informed by the family members of Aziz, A group of cops headed by the S.I. of Chouddogram Thana rescued the victim and hospitalized him in Upozila Health Complex. He was afterwards taken to the District Sadar Hospital when his condition deteriorated to ‘critical’ and then the doctors on duty declared him dead.”

He said, “The government strewed Chhatra League and Jubo League terrorists upon Chhatrashibir failing to face it ideologically and countless leaders and activists have been killed in their hands. Shibir activist Abdul Aziz was brutally killed yesterday for no justifiable causes.”

He warned the government that the people licensed Chhatra League and Jubo League to kill humans. Indiscriminate killings of Shibir activists won’t be tolerated any longer. The killers of Shibir activist Abdul Aziz are well-identified and hence they must be arrested and brought to justice without further delay.

He urged the government to immediately bring the killers to book and refrain from such ill enterprise in the coming days.
